answers.answer: I do not think it is related.  Ask your doctor.Dr. O.

I have red lines under my eyes,,,, do you think it has to do with stress, because I'm only 12 and I have alot of stress in my life, and ever since it started, there has been red lines forming under my eye lids. And it is not from lack of sleep because I don't lack in sleep.

question: I was on Levaquin (along with normal diabetes and high cholesterol medicines) and I woke up and had big bags under my eyes, a sandy feeling to my skin there and a pronounced red line under each bag that looked like someone had slit it with a razor blade.  Despite stopping the Levaquin, it has persisted for a number of days.  Can you provide an explanation of what is happening?
title: Red line under lower eyelid bag
